text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket has been waiting her<n>whole life for today.
This is her chance<n>to accomplish her dream of winning<n>the
Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Exhale...

Hand on her chest, she lets out a<n>deep breath. She slowly
opens her<n>eyes and gazes at the turf at the end<n>of the
tunnel.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Even standing behind her, I can tell<n>she's never been so
focused.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she's normally making a racket<n>screaming our ears
off.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oooh... Even I'm getting nervous...

All of Team Sirius is waiting with<n>bated breath as they watch
Winning<n>Ticket's valiant figure from afar. But<n>the stoic
competitor breaks the<n>silence.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nnngh! Hrrrgh! It's no good, I'm all<n>itchy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I get all tense when I focus! And<n>when I get tense, I get
itchy!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's the Tickezo I know.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: That's the Tickezo I know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If you're really that itchy, we can use<n>our special trick to
give you a decent<n>send off.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Special trick?

Mejiro McQueen gives the signal to<n>the others, and they all
raise their<n>open palms up behind Winning<n>Ticket's back.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-one, two... three!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Good luck!
Whack!
All at once, they slap Winning Ticket<n>on the back.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hyaaah! That was hard!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You're good to go! Now, have the<n>best Derby ever, Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You know I will! I'm gonna run the<n>race of my life!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Until now, the Derby has been<n>something exciting that I
aspired to.<n>But this time, I'm actually in it...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I've got my rivals, my team, and mytrainer with me... Now this is myDerby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Just watch me!
